name: cmdspace-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins by CMDSPACE (커맨드스페이스) - Research Pipeline, and more

metadata.description: CMDS Process (Connect → Merge → Develop → Share) 기반 Claude Code 플러그인 모음

plugins.name: research-pipeline
plugins.description: Research-to-Publication Pipeline following the CMDS Process (Connect → Merge → Develop → Share). Orchestrates literature discovery, synthesis, manuscript drafting, editing, and journal formatting using 5 specialized sub-agents and 5 skills.

plugins.name: dev-orchestrator
plugins.description: Autonomous Development Orchestrator with 3-Tier agent system (Opus/Sonnet/Haiku). 13 specialized agents and 12 skills for the full SDLC — planning, architecture, implementation, testing, review, and documentation.
